Class DatastreamImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.FedoraResourceImpl
        • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.DatastreamImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.jcr.FedoraJcrTypes, org.fcrepo.kernel.Datastream, org.fcrepo.kernel.FedoraResource

    public class DatastreamImpl
extends FedoraResourceImpl
implements org.fcrepo.kernel.Datastream
    Abstraction for a Fedora datastream backed by a JCR node.
    Since:
    Feb 21, 2013
    Author:
    ajs6f
